# @hai3/i18n

> Internationalization with 36 languages, namespace support, lazy loading, and RTL detection for HAI3 SDK.

Part of the HAI3 SDK Layer (L1) - can be used independently without other @hai3 packages. Zero dependencies.

## Core API

- [i18nRegistry](https://hai3.dev/docs/i18n/registry): Singleton for translations
- [Language](https://hai3.dev/docs/i18n/languages): Enum of 36 language codes
- [createI18nRegistry](https://hai3.dev/docs/i18n/create): Factory for isolated testing

## Key Patterns

- Namespace keys: `namespace:key.subkey` (e.g., `screen.demo.home:title`)
- Lazy loading via `registerLoader()` with dynamic imports
- RTL detection for Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, Urdu
- Parameter interpolation: `{param}` syntax

## Quick Start

```typescript
import { i18nRegistry, Language, I18nRegistryImpl } from '@hai3/i18n';

// Register translations directly
i18nRegistry.register('common', Language.English, {
  'app.title': 'My App',
  'app.welcome': 'Welcome, {name}!'
});

// Or lazy load per screen
const screenTranslations = I18nRegistryImpl.createLoader({
  [Language.English]: () => import('./i18n/en.json'),
  [Language.Spanish]: () => import('./i18n/es.json'),
});

// Use translations
const title = i18nRegistry.t('common:app.title');
const welcome = i18nRegistry.t('common:app.welcome', { name: 'John' });

// Language management
await i18nRegistry.setLanguage(Language.Spanish);
const isRTL = i18nRegistry.isRTL();
```
